cultural_event.Rules:
Participants: Minimum 5, Maximum 10.

Duration: 5 + 2 minutes.

Costume: Should be decent.

Type: Classical, Semi Classical, Folk.

Music should be submitted in a CD/Pen-drive in the morning to the organizers.

Criteria for Judgement: Team Work, Rapport Building, Synchronization, Stage Creations, Choreography, Costumes and Confidence.

Participants: Minimum 5, Maximum 10.

Duration: 5 + 2 minutes.

Type: Any pure form of western dances like Hip Hop, Jazz, Filmy, Freestyle etc.

Costume: Should be decent.

Music should be submitted in a CD/Pen-drive in the morning to the organizers.

 Props are allowed.

Criteria for Judgement: Team Work, Rapport Building, Synchronization, Stage Creations, Choreography, Costumes and Confidence.

Duration: 4 + 1 minutes (Including settings).

Costume: Should be decent.

Music should be submitted in a CD/Pen-drive in the morning to the organizers.

No hazardous stage props allowed.

Criteria for Judgement: Technique, Grace, Confidence, Expression, Stage Presence.

Duration: 4 + 1 minutes (Including settings).

Costume: Should be decent.

Music should be submitted in a CD/Pen-drive in the morning to the organizers.

No hazardous stage props allowed.

Criteria for Judgement: Technique, Grace, Confidence, Expression, Stage Presence.

Duration: 4 + 1 minutes.

Combination of Participants: Male & Male/ Male & Female/ Female & Female.

Type: Any dance style.

Costume: Should be decent.

Music should be submitted in a CD/Pen-drive in the morning to the organizers.

Props are allowed.

Duration: 5 + 1 minutes.(Including settings)

The rendition can be only classical.

Musical Instruments or Karaoke is allowed but will not be considered as judgement criterion.

Participants are allowed to bring maximum 2 instruments.

Criteria for Judgement: Shruthi, Swara, Tala, Raga, Laya, Selection of Song and general impression.

Duration: 3 + 1 minutes.

Combination of Participents:
Male & Male
Male & Female
Female & Female

Musical Instruments or Karaoke is allowed but will not be considered as judgement criterion.

Both classical and filmi songs are allowed

Hindi and Kannada songs are allowed.

Critiria for Judgement : 
Shruthi,Swara,Tala,Raga,Laya,Selection of Song and General Impression.

Duration: 2 Hours.

Participants should bring their own materials.

No usage of ready-made designs and/or chalks & other properties (scale, thread, pencil, strainer, stick).

Particiants shall have to prepare a Rangoli within the space provided.

Judgement Criteria: Color combination, Area Covered, Neatness, Decoration, Completion.

Duration: 1 Hours.

Participants can use only pencil, eraser, cotton.

No microstrip pencil. Geometrical instruments like scales are allowed.

The topic is given on the spot.

Tracing is prohibited.

Duration: 2 Hours.

Topic will be giveng on the spot.

Painting can be done using oil/water/poster colors.

Participants should bring their own materials.

Judgement Criteria: Creativity, Color Combination, Neatness, Theme, Completion.

Duration: 1 Hours.

Participants are required to make a unified artistic image on a given topic/theme by sticking together pieces of paper of pictures.

Required material should be brought by participants (glue, cello tape, newspaper, magazines etc).

Two participants per team.

All photos taken should be submitted before 1.00PM on the same day.

The photos should be original. No editing is allowed.

Obscene or offensive photos will be rejected.

Participants should bring their own DSLR cameras.

Specfic instructions will be given on the spot.

Three members per team.

Only waste materials in the campus can be used for the purpose.

Other than waste materials glue and other adhesives, pins, colors can be used.

Judges have right to disqualify any artwork if major material used is not a waste material.

Participants are not allowed to bring any pre-made structure. All the work has to be finished within prescribed time limit.

Duration: 2 Hours.

Participants: Minimum 10, Maximum 16.

Duration: 13 + 2 minutes.

Costume: Should be decent.

There should be atleast one solo act and one group act.

Music should be submitted in a CD/Pen-drive in the morning to the organizers.

Criteria for Judgement: Team Work, Stage Creations, Creativity, Costumes and Confidence.

Duration: 5 + 1 minutes including settings.

Instrumentation can be Indian or western.

Type: Percussion or Non - Percussion.

Criteria for Judgement: Shruthi, Swara, Laya, Tala, Raga and general impression.

Participants: Minimum 3 Maximum 6.

Duration: 9+1 minutes including settings.

Instrumentation can be indian or western.

Type: Percussion or Non - Percussion.

Criteria for Judgement: Shruthi, Swara, Laya, Tala, Raga and general impression.

Three members per team.

First round prelims (written).

5 Teams will be selected in first round.

Number of rounds and additional rules for the event will be announced at the venue.
